titleStmt.title: An exact collection of choice declarations, with pleas, replications, rejoynders, demurrers, assignement of errours and the entries of judgments thereupon affirmed. / Collected by VV. S. one of the clerks of the upper bench office : in the reignes of Queen Elizabeth, King James, and the late King Charles. Diligently perused, and translated into English, for the benefit and helpe of young clerkes. With an exact table, wherein may be found the principall matters contained in the whole book.
titleStmt.author: W. S., One of the clerks of the Upper Bench Office.

titleStmt.title: An exact collection of choice declarations, with pleas, replications, rejoynders, demurrers, assignement of errours and the entries of judgments thereupon affirmed. / Collected by VV. S. one of the clerks of the upper bench office : in the reignes of Queen Elizabeth, King James, and the late King Charles. Diligently perused, and translated into English, for the benefit and helpe of young clerkes. With an exact table, wherein may be found the principall matters contained in the whole book.
titleStmt.author: W. S., One of the clerks of the Upper Bench Office.
J. W.
Sheppard, William, d. 1675?, attributed name.
Small, William, 17th cent, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. W. and T. R. for John Place, and are to be sold at his shop at Furnivalls Inne Gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to both William Sheppard and William Small.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "28 ffeb: 1652"; the 3 in imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
